Body.Content:
AI Notes in chats will be removed from public preview and will no longer be available to users.

When this will happen:

Public Preview: We will begin removing the feature at the end of June 2025.

How this will affect your organization:

Public preview users will no longer see the entry point for AI Notes in the Teams chat header.

What you need to do to prepare:

Please prepare to communicate this to end users if they can no longer find the feature.

Details.Name: Summary
Details.Value: AI Notes in Microsoft Teams chats will be removed from public preview by the end of June 2025. Users will no longer see the AI Notes entry point in the chat header. Organizations should inform users about this change.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Facilitator agent notes in chats (Preview)
